partialCompletionMessage: MashaAllah, you completed your prayers today.
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah accept your salah and bless your day.
blessingMessage: May Allah reward your effort and help you pray all on time tomorrow, inshaAllah.

completionMessage: You've completed all your prayers today!
partialCompletionMessage: Well done for completing your five prayers today.
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah reward your dedication and grant you peace.
blessingMessage: Strive to guard their timing more closely tomorrow, inshaAllah. Allah sees your efforts.

completionMessage: Alhamdulillah, all prayers done for today!
partialCompletionMessage: May Allah bless you for fulfilling your daily prayers.
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah shower His blessings upon your worship.
blessingMessage: Aim to perfect their timing tomorrow, inshaAllah. Every step counts.

partialCompletionMessage: You made it through all five prayers—Alhamdulillah!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah accept your efforts and guide your heart.
blessingMessage: Let’s aim for all on time tomorrow, inshaAllah. Allah is Most Merciful.

partialCompletionMessage: Great progress! Completing all your prayers is a beautiful step.
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah make your salah a means of closeness to Him.
blessingMessage: Try to catch every one on time next time, inshaAllah.

completionMessage: SubhanAllah, all prayers checked off today!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah bless your commitment and strengthen your faith.
blessingMessage: Let this be a reminder to strive for timely prayers next time, inshaAllah.

partialCompletionMessage: Alhamdulillah for every prayer you completed today.
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah grant you tranquility through your worship.
blessingMessage: With intention and effort, tomorrow can be even better, inshaAllah.

completionMessage: You've nailed all your prayers today!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah accept your devotion and uplift your spirit.
blessingMessage: May Allah make it easy for you to pray on time always, inshaAllah.

partialBlessingMessage: May Allah reward your steadfastness with His mercy.
blessingMessage: May Allah continue to guide you, and help you improve your timing each day, inshaAllah.

completionMessage: Bravo, all prayers done for the day!
partialBlessingMessage: May Allah make your salah a light for your path.
blessingMessage: Keep striving—timeliness brings more barakah, inshaAllah.
